Question: This chance also allowed this person to deepen his relationship with Mamah Cheney.
Hints: Between 1900 and 1901, this person completed four houses which have since been considered the onset of the "Prairie style".
In An Autobiography, this person claimed that he was unaware that his side ventures were a breach of his contract.
The Jacobses also commissioned the "Solar Hemicycle" by this person in 1944, a seminal project in the solar house movement.
